title: Trouble With The Actor based on the tutorial

content.raw:
I have been trying to experiment with actors in Gazebo to create scripted animations.
I have been following the tutorial on the Gazebosim homepage
http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=actor&cat=build_robo

I get do not get the expected behavior if I add any other component that is in contact with the physics engine and I use the <script> tag.
For the cube I stop and then suddenly jumps position like I previously reported here:
#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2482/actor-and-lidar-sensor-problems

For the walking person, he appears halfway through the ground-plane and moves with his arms stretched out. If I remove the  <script> tag from the waling actor everything seems to work as intended. 

Is there some way I can debug, this problem to provide are a more clear report ?

I am running ubuntu 18.04.1 and Gazebo 9.0.0
